events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this item is not what I paid for.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case for the wrong product delivery.
Hello! This is Sarah from support. I am here to help you with your refund request for the product you received incorrectly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so I can verify and start the refund process?
Here is my order number 987654 and attached is a photo showing the wrong product that arrived instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3 to 5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for resolving this quickly. I appreciate your help with the refund.
The refund request has been approved and will be completed shortly. Please check your account for the refunded amount.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund has been received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
